data.name: Orange Everyday
data.description: An everyday transaction account with no monthly fees.

features.additionalInfo: Use your own money with the convenience of Visa. Available worldwide where Visa is accepted and EFTPOS is available.
Leave your wallet at home and pay the easy way with Apple Pay.
Leave your wallet at home and pay the easy way with Google Pay.
No need for BSB and account number. Receive real time payments using your own unique ID.
Receive SMS notifications when your balance is above or below an amount, a withdrawal or deposit is made or when your salary is deposited.

An optional tool where every eligible card purchase you make is rounded up to the nearest $1 or $5 and the rounded up amount is shifted from your Orange Everyday to your nominated Savings Maximiser account, eligible ING Home Loan or charity.

You could get 1% cashback on eligible gas, electricity and water bill payments made from your Orange Everyday account using BPAY or Direct Debit (BSB and account number) when you meet the monthly eligibility criteria. Cashback benefit of up to $100 per financial year. T&Cs apply

When you deposit $1,000 or more per month from an external source into any personal ING account (excluding Living Super and Orange One) and make 5+ card purchases that are settled (not pending) each month, the first 5 times you’re charged fees to withdraw cash at an ATM each month per account we'll rebate it (excludes International ATM Operator fees).

eligibility.additionalInfo: You must be aged 18 or over.
You must be an Australian resident for taxation purposes.

discounts.description: Pay no ING International Transaction Fees when you shop online and overseas.

eligibility.additionalInfo: When you deposit $1,000 or more per month and make 5+ card purchases that are settled (not pending) each month.

discounts.description: Up to 5 eligible ATM withdrawal fees rebated each month.

eligibility.additionalInfo: When you deposit $1,000 or more per month from an external source into any personal ING account (excluding Living Super and Orange One) and make 5+ card purchases that are settled (not pending) each month, we will rebate the ATM fees for the first 5 fee incurring ATM withdrawals (excludes International ATM Operator fees).
